pdp.emi.terms.intro: Welcome to Myntra. This page details the Equated Monthly Installments (EMI)  made available on Myntra marketplace platform (Myntra) on behalf of participating seller/s at their sole discretion and may be revoked or suspended by them any time. These terms and conditions are in addition to the Myntra Terms of Use to which you agree and are bound by using Myntra.
terms: The EMI payment option is available only on credit cards issued by the following banks: HDFC, ICICI, SBI, CitiBank, Axis, Amex, HSBC, IndusInd, Kotak, RBL ,Standard Chartered.

The EMI facility is offered by the card issuing bank through PayUBiz. The EMI eligibility, payment plan and refund rules are solely on the internal discretion and approvals of the bank. Myntra shall not be held liable for any dispute between the customer and bank arising out of or in connection with the EMI payment made on Myntra.

The EMI facility is available for all products on Myntra except some jewellery items especially gold items. Myntra reserves the right to stop the EMI facility against any product sold on the platform anytime without any priority notice.
The facility is available only for order value above Rs. 2500. The minimum eligible order value varies from bank to bank.
Myntra reserves the right to temporarily or permanently stop the EMI facility without any prior notice.
Myntra does not charge the customer any processing or convenience fee for this service

Myntra is offering the EMI facility through PayU Biz. The EMI plans, tenure and interest are as per the information shared with PayU Biz. For any concern or dispute a customer should contact the respective bank.

In the case of cancellations or returns of items purchased on EMI, Myntra will facilitate the refunds for and on behalf of the sellers as per the relevant refund policy. The customer is advised to check with the respective bank/issuer offering the EMI how the cancellations or refund will affect the EMI terms and of any pre-closure or interest charges levied on the customer.

beforeSlot.desc: You have an early entry slot. Shop before the sale starts & get your favourite products before they’re sold out. Hurry!

atSlot.desc: You have an exclusive VIP Slot. Shop before the sale starts and grab your favourite products before they run out.

afterSlot.desc: Your VIP Slot has ended. You can continue to shop during the sale starting midnight. See you there!

noSlot.title: EXCLUSIVE GOLD SLOT
noSlot.desc: Start shortlisting your favourite styles now and get a slot for early access to the sale.

links.title: PLAY GAMES NOW TO GET A SLOT

desc.__html: Invite your friends to the End Of Reason Sale & get ₹50 for every friend who visits. They get ₹50 too.

kvpairs.hrdr.pricereveal.data: {"enable":"false","buttonlabel":"Sales starts at midnight","info":"Select size to check if we have very few left"}

linesLevel1: Checkout before the sale rush starts.
Pay only Rs. 99 extra per order and get your favourite products at sale prices today..
linesLevel2: Pay only Rs. 99 extra (non refundable) for the entire order and shop at sale price now.
No need of worrying about products or sizes going out-of-stock and no need of shopping at midnight!

option2.header: Wait For The Sale To Start
linesLevel1: Wait for the sale to start and shop without paying the Rs. 99 fee.
linesLevel2: Don't want to pay the Early Access fee? Wait for the sale to start
There is a chance that your favourite products will run out-of-stock during the sale rush.
Sale to start at 00:01 hours, 9th Dec

body.cardReturn: Go to <strong>Menu</strong> > <strong>My Orders</strong> > <strong>Return</strong> and select the time slot and mode for return
body.cardAgentCustomer: Delivery agent will pick up the product
body.cardCash: Refund will be processed in 7-14 days after the quality check

return.footer: <strong>Note:</strong> The product should not be damaged and the price tags should be intact. T&C applicable

body.cardExchange: Go to <strong>Menu</strong> > <strong>My Orders</strong> > <strong>Exchange</strong> and select the time slot for exchange
body.cardAgentCustomer: Delivery agent will deliver the new product and pick up the old one

exchange.footer: <strong>Note:</strong> The product should not be damaged and the price tags should be intact. T&C applicable

try.header: How does Try and Buy work?

body.cardTry: Select option <strong>"Try and Buy"</strong> in the address confirmation page
body.cardAgentCustomer: Delivery agent waits while you try the items
body.cardClothes: Keep the items you like and return the rest to the agent
body.cardCash: Pay only for what you keep (for pay on delivery orders) or get refunded for the ones returned (for prepaid orders)

try.footer: <strong>Ordering for the first time?</strong> You can also avail COD with Try & Buy and pay only for what you keep. T&C applicable

differentialReturns.header: How hassle free 15 day return works

body.bpcReturnRequest: <h6>Raise Return Request</h6><p>Go to ‘My Orders’ section and click on return on a wrong, defective or expired product</p>
body.bpcRequestApproval: <h6>Request Approval</h6><p>Once the request is raised, it’ll be evaluated within 3 business days.</p>
body.bpcRefund: <h6>Refund</h6><p>The amount will be refunded to the selected mode once the product is picked up and physically evaluated*</p>

differentialReturns.footer: <p style='color:#ff5722';">*In case of self ship, courier the item to the nearest warehouse. Check FAQ for details</p>

newUsersPDP.title: Flat 500 Off
newUsersPDP.description: Applicable on your first order.<br/> Use code: MYNTRA500

exchange.title: Easy 14 days exchange
exchange.description: Choose to exchange for a different size (if available) within 14 days.

returnAndExchange.title: Easy 14 days returns and exchange
returnAndExchange.description: Choose to return or exchange for a different size (if available) within 14 days.

noReturnAndExchange.title: Return and Exchange not available
noReturnAndExchange.description: Items like innerwear, socks, certain accessories and some high-value fragile items do not come under our return/exchange policy.

differentialReturns.title: Hassle Free returnPeriod Day Return
differentialReturns.description: You can return the product within returnPeriod days if the delivered product is damaged, expired, different from ordered.

share.title: Invite Friends
share.description: Invite friends to Myntra’s End Of Reason Sale & SAVE UP TO ₹500  EXTRA
share.subject: Hey, come check out Myntra's End Of Reason Sale 10th - 16th Dec where the best of brands are at 50-90% Off! Click this link & we could both get up to ₹150 Off at India's biggest fashion sale!

data.title: Invite & Earn (29th Nov - 16th Dec)
data.body: Invite friends to the sale & win up to ₹150 MynCash for every friend who visits. They also win up to ₹150 MynCash.

data.title: Purchase & Redeem (9th Dec - 16th Dec)
data.body: When you are shopping at the sale, select the MynCash option on the checkout page (as shown in the image below). You can claim a maximum of 10% of your total order value. Your MynCash will expire at 11:59 PM on Dec 16th, 2022.

data.title: How to Use
data.body: Once you have earned some MynCash by referring your friends, simply apply them through a checkbox at the transaction page when you checkout. Image shown below.

referredUser.heading: You Won
referredUser.info: A friend has invited you to Myntra's End Of Reason Sale. Visit now & get a chance to win up to ₹150 MynCash!
